data.name: Confederate Express Demo
data.detailed_description:
GAMEPLAY

Featuring MOBA/RTS-like control mechanics: farming mobs while moving to dodge their bullets. Avoid getting hit to unlock secret items in shops.




Confederate Express is a serene visual experience with a tranquil atmosphere. As it starts off with a relaxing stroll - the game progresses - and you are faced with an ever increasing challenge, at times seemingly impossible to overcome.

LORE

Set in dystopian future, you assume a role of a brutal exterminator trying to deliver a mysterious package. Navigate through 50 seemingly impossible scenarios, obliterating your enemies into an explosive waterfall of blood and gore, all while your skills are constantly being challenged by an increasing number of vicious enemies using deadly tactics.

TECHNOLOGY

Confederate Express boasts an unmistakable visual style - "aliasing" - powered by a proprietary extreme-performance rendering framework - False2D™ API. This technology allows for an unparalleled visual fidelity, transforming a collection of over 50,000 hand drawn animation frames into a spectacular masterpiece of visual storytelling.

data.short_description: GAMEPLAYFeaturing MOBA/RTS-like control mechanics: farming mobs while moving to dodge their bullets. Avoid getting hit to unlock secret items in shops. Confederate Express is a serene visual experience with a tranquil atmosphere.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Quad-Core i7
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 670 2GB VRAM, OpenGL 4.5
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Display Resolution 1920x1080
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: 3.7 GHz Quad-Core i7
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 680 4GB VRAM, OpenGL 4.5
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Display Resolution 2560x1440

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Sierra (10.12)
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Quad-Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 650M 1GB VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Display Resolution 1440x900
